attributes.title: RUINED MY LIFE!
attributes.review:
I really REALLY wish I could give the app ZERO stars... it’s that bad! This app took FOREVER to download. And when I say forever I mean FOREVER! Weeks! When it finally downloaded I checked the app and there was nothing! It kept logging me out! It froze my whole phone and I couldn’t use it for a month! I’m still in shock about how one app could ruin my entire phone. Everything was gone! Everything! And I kept  getting these weird, creepy messages threatening me to vote for Trump... I can’t block the number for some reason and if I mange to do so they’ll just text from another number! I deleted it and tried to download it again because for some reason I wanted to say lOyal to our Cheeto president. And then I download it again. This time when I opened the app all I could see were more threatening messages! More and more! I was scared for my life! Then after having it for a few days, there was a loud knock at my door. I never open the door for strangers but I didn’t have to because they busted the door down! How could they? I would never something so terrible from our pErfect president... (🙄) They took my siblings and held me down so I couldn’t do anything... All I could do was watch. They wouldn’t give them back until I agreed to support trump. I told them I would and they eventually gave me my siblings back but once they left I revealed that I crossed my fingers the whole time while I made the promise and I ended up cursing them. 🙃 
Long story short, DON’T download it! It will ruin your life just like it ruined mine! Every night I still dream about that orange monster knocking down my door...and his little minions mindlessly listening to him...
Thank you for your time. 😌
